name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report: It was a traffic dispute. A 35-year-old electric bike driver injured people with a weapon, resulting in one death. The suspect has been detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 18, students from various universities in Jiangsu posted photos of security guards ready to go.
Netizens responded: "A 70-year-old man guards the school gate" and "The gangsters have already chopped five people, and the security guards haven't seen them clearly yet."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wuyi Road subway station in Changzhou, Jiangsu.
Fully armed police officers stand guard outside the subway station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Xiao Gang, former chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, said that they and senior leaders had a "psychological goal" of 3,000 points for A-shares, and that there was no scientific theoretical calculation process or policy indicator for "3,000 points", which was only affected by the psychological factors of leaders at all levels. In addition, he also said that senior leaders had psychological concerns about "exchange rate breaking 7" many times, but they did not feel any actual problems after it actually "broke 7".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, the C01 bus from Yibin Station to Songjia Xiniu Village in Yibin City, Sichuan Province, was blocked by elderly people who demanded the government to solve the problem due to unreasonable stops along the way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 18, a student from Wuhan Foreign Language School jumped off a building.
At the school league that night, college players knelt down in silence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 18, a student from Wuhan Foreign Language School jumped off a building.
The student was one of the goalkeepers of the school's 29th League.
At the football match that evening, the players collectively mourned for him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! Half an hour ago
On November 19, at Yong'an Primary School in Dingcheng District, Changde, a man took revenge on society by driving his car into primary school students on their way to school.
The children at the scene fled in all directions, and then the driver was subdued by the crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A local person posted that more than a dozen students were hit and more than ten people were sent to the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/GNW8yA87Sn

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People nearby smashed the glass of the vehicle involved in the accident with a shovel

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A large number of people were knocked to the ground and the driver was arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to an insider, the incident happened in the morning, during the morning rush hour, when many children were queuing behind the school gate to enter the school. The murderer was suspected to have "premeditated the time".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A shop owner near Yong'an Primary School told reporters: There were originally isolation stone pillars at the school gate, but they were all knocked away by a car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A shop owner near the school told the reporter: There were stone barriers at the school gate, but they were knocked away by a car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to an insider, the incident happened in the morning, during the morning rush hour, when many children were queuing behind the school gate to enter the school. The murderer was suspected to have "premeditated the time".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, searching for some terms no longer shows live videos, and live videos are being deleted one after another. There are only a few text reports.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, topics related to the incident have been banned on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Local netizens contributed: (rough description) First, almost ten minutes after the incident, the district-level Cyberspace Administration had already organized actions to respond. In other words, the government has now formed a mature stability maintenance system for such incidents, and stability maintenance has a high priority. So much so that once such an emergency occurs, the Cyberspace Administration will quickly start organizing speech censorship on major platforms at a speed almost the same as the police and rescue personnel. It can be said that the stability maintenance action is faster than the ambulance.
Second, this revenge social attack was attributed to "imitation of the last Zhuhai incident" in an internal phone call of the Cyberspace Administration this morning, and the leader believed that the news report of the Zhuhai incident caused the imitation. From now on, the intensity of reporting on similar incidents may be strictly limited.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 19, the Beijing Normal University-Hong Kong Baptist University United International College sent an email stating that in order to further strengthen campus security and maintain safety, the application for admission via the campus visit QR code will be suspended from now on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, all owners of Suhewan No. 1 in Jing'an District, Shanghai, issued a "Notice of Compulsory Mortgage Suspension for All Owners" to the Shanghai Municipal Government, Agricultural Bank of China and other institutions. If the first phase of the project cannot be delivered on time on November 30, all owners will be forced to suspend their loans until the houses are delivered with guaranteed quality and quantity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, a small storage tank top pressure relief valve leaked at Hengchang Energy Co., Ltd. in Boxing County, Binzhou City, Shandong Province, and white gas leaked out. It is understood that the tank stored ethylene carbonate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 17, Nanjing Marathon.
Professor Wang Guang of Nanjing University of Science and Technology wore a costume of Bao Gong, held up a petition and protested his injustice, but was immediately stopped and taken away by security.
He claimed that he had been wrongly accused of corruption for eight years, but his appeal to the "top" court in Jiangsu was delayed and evaded by the court, and the day of redress is far away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 19, at the entrance of a crowded chess and card hall on Xihua Road in Guangzhou, an old man tried to attack the police with a knife and was subsequently shot dead by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 19, a woman reported her brother-in-law, Guo Chaofeng, under her real name, accusing him of having a huge amount of property of unknown origin. Guo is the former deputy mayor of Shangzhi City, Heilongjiang Province, director of the Finance Bureau, and current general manager of the Audit Department of Longjiang Bank.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Compared with the past, the police report this time did not mention the number of injured and the reason for the murder.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 19, at the Bailu Sports Center in Xiamen, the Chinese team played against the Japanese team.
A Japanese fan was mistaken by Chinese fans at the scene as a Chinese wearing a Japanese team uniform. Thousands of people at the scene pushed and besieged him, shouting "traitor".
Then the police at the scene forcibly took off his jersey.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, special police began to be stationed at the gate of Beijing Renmin University High School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 19, Xiamen Bailu Stadium. China vs. Japan.
During the game, a fan rushed into the stadium, hugged the Japanese goalkeeper, and then ran in the field and rushed towards the Chinese goalkeeper. He was then carried out of the scene by security personnel.
On his body was written "An ant with the ambition of a swan".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/ilwzXvRlPB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 17, Wuhan. A delivery man tried to rush into a customer's home with a knife because he was complained by a customer.
According to the group screenshots, the customer said that the reason for her complaint was that the delivery man did not call or knock on the door, and also delivered the wrong food. Maybe because the platform deducted money, he came to the door with a knife at around 7 o'clock that night. Fortunately, her husband reacted quickly and pushed him out. But the other party threatened to come to the door every day if he couldn't get the money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, schools in Dongguan, Guangdong, sent a group text message to parents: Because of the epidemic, the lower class has lost their jobs, the middle class has lost money, the bosses have gone bankrupt, home mortgage payments have stopped, stock speculation has been halved, and shops have closed. Everyone is so angry that they don’t know where to vent.... If you meet someone who provokes you and scolds you outside, don’t get entangled with it. You might be the straw that breaks the camel’s back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 19, 2024, Nanjing, Jiangsu. A woman knelt down in front of the door of China National Chemical Corporation No. 14 Construction Co., Ltd. and cried for her salary. She hugged the legs of the relevant person in charge and cried: "I beg you to give me my salary... I want my salary, my family can't make ends meet... I don't have money for medical treatment, and I have children and the elderly to support..."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 19, at the gate of Changping Middle School in Dongguan City, parents defended their dead child.
According to the parents, their daughter jumped from the eighth floor right after returning to school on Sunday, and the school only notified them 80 minutes later.
The school has not given a clear response so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 19, Ukraine launched six long-range missiles into Russia.
Ukraine claimed that the missiles hit a military arsenal in the Bryansk region of Russia.
The Russian Ministry of Defense said that the military shot down five US-made ATACMS missiles and destroyed one. The fragments caused a fire at a military facility, but no damage or casualties were caused.
Earlier, Biden approved Ukraine to use missiles provided by the United States to strike areas deep inside Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, a murder case occurred in Zhuji, Zhejiang. After committing the crime, the suspect Xu Yiping named three other village officials in a WeChat group and said, "I was going to kill you one by one, but now it's too late." The local authorities are currently organizing a mountain search and offering a reward of 30,000 yuan. However, netizens in the relevant comment area expressed their support for the suspect.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another perspective: The old man sat on the ground, still holding a knife and confronting four police officers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 19, it was reported online that a man in Antai Garden, Mengyin County, Linyi City, Shandong Province, attacked people with a knife and fought with a group of security guards. There were rumors that the man was mentally ill.
